title: Bug 17758[Navigator] Navigator View. Problems with 'Go Into' action
description: Bug 17758[Navigator] Navigator View. Problems with 'Go Into' action
OB: When using the Navigator View in Eclipse, after packing a project and performing various navigation actions such as 'go into', 'go up', and 'go back', the 'go forward' action becomes enabled but does not navigate to the expected screen. Clicking on 'go forward' does not appear to have any effect. Additionally, the 'go into' action becomes disabled.
SR:
1. Start with a clean F1 build of Eclipse.
2. Import all plugins from the runtime environment to obtain some projects.
3. Pack a project, for example, 'org.eclipse.ant'.
4. Perform the following navigation actions: 'go into', 'go up', 'go back', 'go back'.
5. Observe that the 'go forward' action is enabled, but clicking on it does not navigate to the expected screen.
6. Notice that the 'go into' action is disabled.
7. Attempt to click on the 'go into' action to confirm that it does not respond.
